meta.homeDescription: Digital agency specialized in modern website design and development.
meta.servicesDescription: Web design and development services for brands focused on performance, aesthetics and conversion.
meta.contactDescription: Tell us about your web project and we will send a proposal with scope, timeline and budget.

hero.title: We design fast, clear and memorable web experiences.
hero.description: We build corporate websites, landing pages and product frontends for teams that need a stronger digital presence.

process.title: A structured execution from start to finish.
process.description: We follow a clear method so each stage has purpose, concrete deliverables and well-grounded decisions.

steps.title: Strategic discovery
steps.description: We define goals, audience, value proposition and realistic project scope.

steps.title: Design direction
steps.description: We structure content and design clear interfaces for desktop and mobile.

steps.title: Web production
steps.description: We develop with focus on performance, scalability and easy maintenance.

steps.title: Launch and improve
steps.description: We launch, measure and optimize to sustain growth and conversion.

testimonials.title: Teams already building with us
testimonials.description: Clients who value a real mix of design, technical clarity and speed.

items.quote: We moved from a slow site to a fast, scalable platform. The impact was clear from week one.
items.author: Marina Gomez

items.quote: The team translated our idea into a clear, modern website. The whole process felt smooth and organized.
items.author: Diego Ramos

items.quote: We needed a solid technical base and a more premium look. They met deadlines and exceeded expectations.
items.author: Sofia Ruiz
items.role: Head of Product, Bright Health Tech

faq.title: Common questions before getting started
faq.description: Clear answers about timelines, support and workflow so you can decide with real context.

items.question: How long does a web project take to launch?
items.answer: It depends on scope, but most projects are delivered in 3 to 8 weeks with clear weekly milestones.

items.question: Can you work on an existing website?
items.answer: Yes. We can audit, redesign and evolve your current site without rebuilding everything from scratch.

items.question: Do you include support after launch?
items.answer: Yes. We offer ongoing maintenance, continuous improvements and technical support for new business needs.

items.question: How is project communication organized?
items.answer: We centralize feedback and progress in weekly deliveries so you always know what was done and what comes next.

newsletter.title: Get ideas to improve your website every month
newsletter.description: We share short guides on conversion, performance and web architecture for marketing and product teams.

form.success: Subscription completed. We will only send useful content.
